title: Can i refund a skin i bought ages ago?
body:
I bought Waterloo Miss Fortune but im sure i will never use it anymore because i got Arcade Miss Fortune.
I cant find her on the purchased list and i have 2 refund points left.

replies.body:
How many other purchases have you made since then? Not all of your history is saved forever.

If you really need it, contact support and they'll be able to sort something out.
